QuestData.Title: Culling the Crew
QuestData.Description: If we're going to protect Draenor from the Bonefleet menace, we'll need to thin out the crew.$B$BSee to a swift reduction in their numbers, and we might just push them back into the sea for another year.
QuestData.RewardText: We're lucky you were around to take care of those bony brutes!
